channel.title: Annoying Little Problem
channel.description:
I have been busy making my own shops for a server that I am planning on releasing sometime soon... however, I will often get errors saying that I have "Used the wrong format" when I am putting in the Item ID and the Item Amount.
I will sit in my chair and simply stare at the rows of numbers trying to figure where it's gone wrong. Either I am not looking good enough, or I am missing something that I have no clue about. I got a screenie of one example:
[IMG]http://i38.photobucket.com/albums/e120/cardboard-box/dude.jpg[/img]
The numbers in the red square are the ones that had the error. I even Copy/Pasted the top line, to show that everything is lined up correctly. It looks like every other row, except it has some random error which I cannot figure out for the life of me. (Also, if this helps, since the testscape source I am using has mental problems with most NPC's, I use already existing shops, and just change the Item ID and the Amount.)
So, if anyone has [i]any[/i] ideas of what I can do to fix this, it would be greatly appreciated, thanks.

item.title: Annoying Little Problem
item.dc:creator: @Wolfen_Sty Wolfen Sty
item.description:
@Wolfen_Sty wrote:

I am using what I believe to be a basic TestScape Source.

Read full topic
